titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I wrote part of a sermon. My wife & I dined with Oxford. A pleasant party enough.
Two years ago we were married in the Abbey. We went to Evensong to lay up before the Lord our discoveries, our disillusionments, & our defects.
